trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_JTANDHAA_000_001<tab>Another adventurer come to help the Resistance, you say? Well, if you've a need for arms and armor, you may be in luck.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>You may submit certain craftable items for Disciples of War and Magic to receive a commensurate number of tokens.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>These tokens can then be exchanged for gear of your choosing with a higher item level.

TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_HINOSEN_000_100<tab>Welcome, traveler. If you should happen to find yourself laden with unwanted wares, might you be willing to donate them? Rest assured, you will be well compensated for your contribution.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>You may submit certain craftable items for Disciples of War and Magic to receive a commensurate number of tokens.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>These tokens can then be exchanged for gear of your choosing with a higher item level.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_RASHTI_000_200<tab>Well met, adventurer! Looking to trade? If you're keen to part with unneeded wares, I'll make it worth your while.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>You may submit certain craftable items for Disciples of War and Magic to receive a commensurate number of tokens.
TEXT_REGGYR3RHALGRSREACHJTANDHAA_00509_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>These tokens can then be exchanged for gear of your choosing with a higher item level.
